Audio.Locality: RPPN Estação Veracel, Porto Seguro, Bahia
Audio.Author: Dan Lane
Audio.Comments: Agitated song in response to playback from a bird about 4-5m up in understory of short-stature white sand forest. This vocalization is not 'normal' song. Bird crossed road several times in response to playback. Space between the two vocalizations shortened.bird-seen:yesplayback-used:yes
